inclusion.criterion: all children referred with abdominal pain from January 2000 to June 2006
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: referred by surgeon on the pediatric general surgery service at the Health Sciences Centre (HSC)-Children's Hospital in Winnipeg
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: children with abdominal pain due to other surgical or medical conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
